mapper.select: select distinct c.c_num, c.c_date, c.c_star, c.c_comment, m.m_nickname, o.o_checkin, o.o_checkout, r.r_type, h.h_name from review c, members m, mainorder o, orderdetail od, rooms r, hotel h where c.h_num=#{h_num} and c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = od.o_num and od.r_num = r.r_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
